trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImagesCollection> class represents a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage> objects, which are objects that have an associated image and a name that is unique to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImagesCollection>類別表示的集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage>物件，也就是具有相關聯的映像和集合的唯一名稱的物件。

trans-unit.source: This class is exposed as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Images%2A> collection property of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object, and is only available at run time.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會公開為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Images%2A>集合的根屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>物件，並在執行階段才可用。

trans-unit.source: An image can be any object derived from the .NET Framework <xref:System.Drawing.Image> class, such as <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, which is created dynamically.
trans-unit.target: 影像可能是衍生自.NET Framework 的任何物件<xref:System.Drawing.Image>類別，例如<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>，這以動態方式建立。

trans-unit.source: The image can be stored in this collection, and then assigned at a later time to any image property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImage%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 映像可以儲存在這個集合，並接著指派給中任何映像屬性稍後<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控制，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.BackImage%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When one of the image properties in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control is set by specifying a `string` value, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Images%2A> collection property, of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImagesCollection>, is first checked to see if an image with that name exists.
trans-unit.target: 當其中一個映像內容中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控制項設定所指定`string`值，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Images%2A>類型的集合屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImagesCollection>，會先檢查是否已有該名稱的映像。

trans-unit.source: If a matching <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage> object is found, this image is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果比對<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage>找不到物件，會使用此映像。

trans-unit.source: If a matching <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage> object is not located, the string expression is treated as a URL, image resource name or pathname.
trans-unit.target: 如果比對<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.NamedImage>物件不是位於，字串運算式會被視為 URL、 映像資源名稱或路徑名稱。
